input_args.text: 'Posted on October 28, 2016 by Andrew Midkiff \nPublished on Oct 27, 2016 by Historia – Bel99TV The Great Swindle –‘Big business has no shame”– 1940s rationing & monopoly bank control of U.S. economy made farmers over-produce causing large stockpiles of food, and the prices plummeted, farmers became depressed and financially squeezed. “Sales Dollar Arguments”– history repeats… Share this:'
